name: David Ramirez
text: I hope the character suffers from CTE later on the series. He takes way too much damage. It would be cool if it happens to Ippo while he's young, so the story can explore this aspect of combat sports in a different way than Rocky.    What am I saying, it's a comedy manga too. Never gonna happen  =P    I'm just hoping they make Ippo learn some fricking defense. His defense only works against random mobs--every boss fight he basically takes brain damage.
